result.arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا
result.translation: Mu vy’ukuri abanyemeye Jewe Allah n’Intumwa zanje, bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe, barategekanirijwe Ubwami bw’ijuru ry’iteka “Firdawsi” kuba ari bwo bushikiro bwabo;
